overview.en: ECrypto Coin (ECP COIN) is a crypto currency(developed by ECP ECRYPTOPAY COMPANY LIMITED, a cryptocurrency trading, exchange, investment and education company founded in the year 2013 by a group of crypto traders and exchangers.
overview.zh: ECrypto Coin (ECP COIN)是一种加密货币（由ECP ECRYPTOPAY COMPANY LIMITED开发，这是一家加密货币交易，交易所，投资和教育公司，由一群加密交易商和交易商于2013年成立。
